::Scorponok/Zarak::

Scorponok notices Jotunn near him and stands up right once Jotunn addresses him.

Scorponok: I am Scorponok of the 2nd Generation Decepticons...

Scorponok's head ejects from Scorponok's body and transforms to Zarak in his body armor, now standing of the shoulders of Scorponok's body.

Zarak: As well as Zarak of the Decepticon/Nebulan Headmasters.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Jotunn landed, digging a small crater in the process. He was near
 Skorponok and took out his giant axe.
 
 Jotunn: You are no Predacon. Who are you?
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@...> wrote:
 >
 > The hit of the blast made Remus hovvering backward. While still stable
 > in this form he quickly glide to his rigth while he shot two laser at
 > scorponok.
 >

 batteries to

 about it

 Go! [To

 range of

 > intercept, but
 > >  >  the attackers knew their stuff. Gunrain quickly dodged between the
 > >  >  fliers and took out a lot of the defenders with his multiple guns,
 > >  >  while Skysword did not even bother with dodging, rather
 > preferring to
 > >  >  ram and slice his opponents with his sharp wings. Bombtube took
 > to the
 > >  >  air, immediately attracting attention, but Lock-on gave him some
 > cover
 > >  >  with her saturation missiles. Because of that, he managed to
 bombard
 > >  >  the shields, weakening them dangerously.
 > >  >

 engage in

 > for the

 defenses?

 will see

 center.
